item.value: The tallest building in America is the Willius Tower in Chicago.
The longest word in a major English dictionary is 'Pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis'. It is 45 characters long.
The South Pole is the least sunny placeon earth with only 182 days a year off sunshine
The moon is 384,400 km from earth. If you travelled to the Moon in a plane it would take about 16 days. It takes 3 days in a spaceship to get there.
The earth is the 3rd planet from the sun and is the 5th largest planet in our solar system.

The Spine-tailed Swift is the fastest bird. It can fly at 170 kilometres per hour (105mph). The Peregrine Falcon is the fastest bird that dives headfirst down through the sky. They can travel at up to 200mph.
The first 'talkie' movie was Al Jolson's The Jazz Singer released in 1927.
The launch of the Russian Spiknit 1 spcecraft started the 'space race' between Russia and America. Explorer 1 was the first spacecraft launched by the United States on 31 January 1958.
A shark can hear a fish in the water from more than a mile away.
The world's population grows by over 100 million each year.
There are around 2000 different plant types that humans use as food.
The Cambodian alphabet is the world's largest alphabet, with 74 letters. The world's shortest alphabet, used in the Solomon Islands, has only 11.

Drinking too much water too quickly can lead to water intoxication which causes an imbalance of water in the brain
Alaska is the largest state in America.
In 1783 Jean Pilatre de Rozier ( a Frenchman ) made the first balloon flight, reaching a peak altitude of about 500 ft, and traveling about 51/2 mi in 20 min.
There are 9 planets that circle the sun.
A sneeze generates a wind of 166 km/hr (100 mi/hr), and a cough moves out at 100 km/hr (60 mi/hr).
John Logie Baird was the inventor of the world's first working television system in Hastings, England in 1923.
The biggest planet in the Solar System is Jupiter. It is 317 times as heavy as the earth
